## IToasts.remove() method

Removes a toast from the current array of toasts if present.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(toasts: Toast): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toasts | <code>Toast</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
